bibl.title: Documentary Fragments from Upper Egypt in the Hunterian Museum.
bibl.note: 1. P. Glasgow Hunterian Mus. Inv. 1925.49.05b(a). Protocol (?). Provenance unknown, late 5th c. - 2. Inv. 1925.49.02b. Lease of land. Hermonthis, 21 September 508. - 3. Inv. 1925.45.1c(g). Lease (?). Provenance unknown, 6th c. - 4. Inv. 1925.45.1c(d). Account of money. Provenance unknown, 6th c.
bibl.seg: Benaissa Amin and Nikolaos Gonis, Documentary Fragments from Upper Egypt in the Hunterian Museum.
